name: Out To In
description:
Out To In is a footsies based fighting game with little friction allowing players to be actionable while moving (basically like Melee wave dash). The main moves are Attack, Dodge, Grab and Dash with holding no direction after dash allowing you to move much farther and faster then usual.

Editors Note: I just beat Kizzy Kay and Hook Gang God in a best of 20 and am now the #1 OTI player ever of all time.
